long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,es,es_419,:
This is a free tool that helps users download audio/video from X.com (Twitter) to their computer. We recommend that users do not download copyrighted content without permission.
💥X.com(Twitter)  Twitter Video Downloader Function
☑️  Save videos or images on X
☑️  Save X's music
☑️  Save photos/GIFs on X
☑️  No password, API login or permission required
☑️  Easy to use
☑️  24/7 developer support

Use our free tool to easily download any audio/video from Twitter/X.com through the following simple steps. Follow these simple steps to download audio/video to your computer:
1. Install the plugin.
2. Click on the plugin icon or open the Twitter/X.com web version（ https://x.com ）And log in.
3. Batch download: Browse Twitter content, click the batch download button on the right, and the videos in Twitter will automatically display on the batch download panel. Select the video you want to download and click the batch download button to download it.
4. Single download: After installing the plugin, a "download" button will appear below each video or image, and a "download" button will appear below each audio. Click on it to perform a single download. If it doesn't appear, please click the refresh button in the bottom right corner to try again.

Disclaimer
This extension has no association or affiliation with the official Twitter application/website. This is an unofficial application developed and maintained by independent developers.
long.en_AU,en_GB,en_US:
This is a free tool that helps users download audio/video from X.com (Twitter) to their computer. We recommend that users do not download copyrighted content without permission.
💥 X. Com (Twitter) Twitter Video Downloader Function
☑️  One click download of videos or movies
☑️  One click download of music or audiobooks
☑️  Save restricted audio/video to your local computer.
☑️  Save private videos or pictures

☑️  Support downloading videos/images/photos/GIFs
☑️  No password, API login or permission required
☑️  Easy to use
☑️  24/7 developer support

Support downloading X.com (Twitter) media resources, movies, music, files, and can download the content you want from any X.com (Twitter) Twitter page.
💥  If the audio/video files are available, you can download them.
💥  Video downloader allows you to download videos in multiple formats from multiple sources.
💥  Download audio/video directly online through this plugin.
💥  You can download various types of audio, such as music, audiobooks, etc.
💥  Running on Chrome web pages, you can use it online on Mac and Windows computers. Just install the plugin on your browser, no software needs to be installed.

Use our free tool to easily download any audio/video from Telegram through the following simple steps. Follow these simple steps to download audio/video to your computer:
1. Install the plugin.
2. Click on the plugin icon or open the Telegram web version（ https://x.com ）And log in.
3. Batch download: Scroll through the content in the message dialog box, and Twitter videos will automatically display on the batch download panel. Open the plugin for batch download.
4. Single download: After installing the plugin, a "download" button will appear below each video or image, and a "download" button will appear below each audio. Click on it to perform a single download. If it doesn't appear, please click the refresh button in the bottom right corner to try again.

Disclaimer
This extension has no association or affiliation with the official Twitter application/website. This is an unofficial application developed and maintained by independent developers.
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
这是一个帮助用户下载X.com(Twitter)上的音频/视频到电脑的免费工具。我们建议用户在未经许可的情况下不要下载受版权保护的内容。
💥X.com(Twitter) 推特视频下载器功能
☑️ 保存X上的视频或图片
☑️ 保存X的音乐
☑️ 保存X上的照片/ GIF
☑️ 无需密码、API 登录或权限
☑️ 简单易用
☑️ 24/7 开发者支持

通过以下简单步骤使用我们的免费工具轻松下载推特上的任何音频/视频。按照这些简单步骤将音频/视频下载到电脑：
1. 安装插件。
2. 点击插件图标或者打开推特网页版（https://x.com）并登陆。
3. 批量下载：浏览推特的内容，点击右侧的批量下载按钮，推特中的视频自动显示在批量下载面板上。选择需要下载的视频，点击批量下载按钮进行下载。
4. 单个下载：安装好插件后每个视频或者图片下方会出现“download”按钮，每个音频下方会出现“download”，点击它进行单个下载。如果没出现，请点击右下角的刷新按钮重试。

🕨 免责声明
此扩展程序与官方的推特应用/网站无任何关联或隶属关系。这是一个由独立开发者开发和维护的非官方应用。
